steps: Heat 2 Tbsps sesame oil and garlic in a large skillet over medium heat. Add carrots, cabbage, and pepper. Cook approximately 5 minutes until tender. Meanwhile, prepare the peanut sauce. Add zucchini noodles and shredded chicken; cook and stir 3 minutes until zucchini softens and chicken warms. Remove from heat and set aside. Process in batches if skillet space is limited.
Combine all peanut sauce ingredients in a small saucepan over low heat. Whisk constantly until peanut butter melts and everything combines. Adjust Sriracha to desired heat level.
Pour sauce over chicken and vegetables. Toss until combined. Plate and garnish with sesame seeds, cilantro, peanuts, and green onion. Serve immediately.
Refrigerate leftovers for a few days. Reheat as preferred.
title: Peanut Chicken Zucchini Noodles
